title: Fact Check: Video of Ajmer police COVID-19 awareness rally shared with false claim | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A video of a police rally is being shared on social media with a claim that police personnel visited the Ajmer Sharif Dargah after it reopened.

NewsMobile fact-checked the post and found it to be misleading.

We ran a search and found a tweet by the official handle of Ajmer police featuring a similar video. According to the caption, the rally was held for spreading awareness about Corona.

We also found local news coverage of the same event, dated June 29, 2020.

In the above reports and videos, police can be seen holding hoardings related to Coronavirus.

Hence, from the above information, we can say the video is being circulated with a misleading narrative.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
